title: Ep48: Christmas Truce 1914
itunes:title: Ep48: Christmas Truce 1914
itunes:subtitle: In this special Christmas episode, Peter and Gary explore the fabled Christmas Truce of 1914. Who was involved, what happened, and how has it been remembered over the decades? Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer:...
description:
In this special Christmas episode, Peter and Gary explore the fabled Christmas Truce of 1914. Who was involved, what happened, and how has it been remembered over the decades?

Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki

For more great history content, visit www.LivingHistoryTV.com, or subscribe to our YouTube channel at www.youtube.com/c/LivingHistoryTV

Peter Hart's Military History is a Living History production.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
